faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  So is the OS preinstalled?
faq.answer: The OS is preinstalled and will update itself, if necessary.

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Is ms 10 office 365 installed?
faq.answer: No, Office will need to be purchased separately.

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  I bought the laptop, the same time should match a table I am not sure which color is better, can someone give me suggestion?
faq.answer: I'm not sure what color your table may be, but the Suttle ash silver laptop will blend with any home decor! Enjoy your purchase.

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Is there space to add another hard drive?
faq.answer: You could either connect an external hard drive through a USB port, or add an SD card

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Can I play league of legends?
faq.answer: no. it’s basic laptop 1.8 ghz and barely can do GIS programs that I do in college. it tends to freeze up. E. J

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Can I create powerpoint presentations?
faq.answer: Sure, after you load the Powerpoint software. Double check to make sure you have adequate memory left. W1 · October 24, 2019

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  “hello, is the hardrive 128 gb or 1 tb as indicated in the summary? thanks for the clarification
faq.answer: Same as another here. I read this as it had a 128G SSD and a 1 TB disk. Unpacked it tonight to find that's not true. Only the 128G SSD. Considering a return Richard T. · January 24, 2020

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Can i upgrade my ram?
faq.answer: Yes. You can upgrade your ram upto 16gb.

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Does this Pc has Disc Drive?
faq.answer: There is no disc drive. Here's what it does have: 1 HDMI. 2 USB-A. 1 USB-C. 1 SD card slot (not Micro). 1 3.5mm audio jack. 1 network connector (unsure of the type).

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Would this be good for editing videos for youtube from a GoPro?
faq.answer: No! Anything with an i3 I would not recommend for any kind of editing. The core i3 is an excellent processor, but it is only a dual with hyper threading enabled. If you’re looking for something to do editing I recommend an core i5 or i7, or an AMD 2600x or 2700x. 8gb of ddr4 ram. Also something with at least 1tb o… see more No! If you’re looking for something to do editing I recommend an core i5 or i7, or an AMD 2600x or 2700x. 8gb of ddr4 ram. Also something with at least 1tb of storage. faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Does this computer support 5G?
faq.answer: I am not sure

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  can my son game on this laptop?
faq.answer: These computers are great for general gaming but anything that requires high quality graphics will struggle to be playable as this system has Intel On-board graphics processing. So yes, it will play minecraft, and other games, it will not be a gaming laptop with 3-d graphics for fortnight or Call of Duty. Bryan Jackson / Bryans Compute… · December 26, 2018

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  What is the laptop model name?
faq.answer: The model name/number is 14-CF014DX.

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Can this connect to wifi?
faq.answer: Yes

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  I'm an old guy with decreasing vision...wondered how is it going from a 15.6 screen to a 14? Does better screen resolution outweigh size difference?
faq.answer: Interesting, I made the switch a month ago to this laptop and it has not been a problem for me. This size is a good compromise. Great portability and power, need to put the cheaters on for reading comfort. But, that was true on my old larger screen too

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  How many hours of battery life on a full charge?
faq.answer: About 5 hours with constant use. I’ve left the laptop in my bag for 3 days and still had 65%

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  what is the version of Microsoft Offices?
faq.answer: MS Office not included. You will have to buy separately

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  How can I figure out what charger to get if mine broke?
faq.answer: That is not so easy. Ive done this 2 or 3 times successfully

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  After the warranty expires do you recommend running the manufacturers bloatware or taking it off?
faq.answer: Take it off. Xavier G

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Are these dimensions right? 32.4 x 22.6 x 2 inches
faq.answer: No. When closed, it measures 12.75 x 9 x 0.75. Random shopper · September 5, 2019

faq.question: amazon-hp 2019  Can you tell me the specific charger/cord I need to replace this one exactly. I’ve lost mine!
faq.answer: There's no model number on the charger. Suggest you Google HP 2019 14 Laptop … that's what I did, and there are multiple sources for the charger you need. J. Cain · January 6, 2020
